mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_db.deal_summary (title, url, price, site, posted_at, created_at, likes, img) VALUES (#{title}, #{url}, #{price}, #{site}, #{postedAt}, #{createdAt}, #{likes}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, url, price, site, posted_at, created_at, likes FROM project_db.deal_summary WHERE title LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY posted_at DESC
